description: Numbers n such that string 1,2 occurs in the base 7 representation of n but not of n+1.
mathematica: Transpose[SequencePosition[Table[If[SequenceCount[IntegerDigits[n,7],{1,2}]>0,1,0],{n,2000}],{1,0}]][[1]] (* The program uses the SequencePosition and SequenceCount functions from Mathematica version 10 *) (* _Harvey P. Dale_, May 24 2015 *)
author: _Clark Kimberling_
